org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager

类 JobLeaderIdService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.JobLeaderIdService

  • public class JobLeaderIdService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service which retrieves for a registered job the current job leader id (the leader id of the job manager responsible for the job). The leader id will be exposed as a future via the getLeaderId(JobID). The future will only be completed with an exception in case the service will be stopped.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  JobLeaderIdService.JobLeaderIdListener
      Listener which stores the current leader id and exposes them as a future value when requested.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      High availability services to use by this service.
      private JobLeaderIdActions jobLeaderIdActions
      Actions to call when the job leader changes.
      private java.util.Map<JobID,JobLeaderIdService.JobLeaderIdListener> jobLeaderIdListeners
      Map of currently monitored jobs.
      private Time jobTimeout 
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private ScheduledExecutor scheduledExecutor

        public void start(JobLeaderIdActions initialJobLeaderIdActions)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Start the service with the given job leader actions.
        参数:
        initialJobLeaderIdActions - to use for job leader id actions
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - which is thrown when clearing up old state

        抛出:

        public void clear()
           throws java.lang.Exception

        public void addJob(JobID jobId)

        抛出:
